product_name: Klean Kanteen Loop Cap Bottle Cap
long_description: Can't find your bottle cap? This Kleen Kanteen Loop Cap replaces lost caps for most Klean Kanteen water bottles. Loop allows you to clip your bottle to a backpack with an accessory carabiner (sold separately). Made with polypropylene plastic, which contains no BPA. Fits all narrow-mouth Klean Kanteen Classic bottle sizes. Dishwasher safe.
short_description: Can't find your bottle cap? This Kleen Kanteen Loop Cap replaces lost caps for most Klean Kanteen water bottles.
